---
name: "FR-005 Notes"
about: "Add lightweight note-taking system inside HUD"
title: "[FR-005] Notes"
labels: [feature, notes, mvp]
assignees: ""
---

## Summary
HUD panel to create and manage notes.

## Requirements
- Notes saved to SQLite.
- Add notes via text input or HUD button.
- Search and list panel.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Notes persist across restarts.
- Search works correctly.
- Max 500 notes.

## Dependencies
- FR-003 HUD
- FR-010 Data & Security
